alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 11 at 3:57PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Lafayette, Dixie and southeastern Taylor Counties through 445 PM EST... At 357 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Steinhatchee to 11 miles northwest of Horseshoe Point. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Steinhatchee, Horseshoe Point, Horseshoe Beach, Tennille, Shamrock, Clara, Cross City Airport, Shired Island, Jena, Hines, Jonesboro and Eugene. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette
